description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: beautiful, elegant and modern Dusseldorf, a Centre of art in Germany; Chancellor Schmidt pays a visit to the Soviet Union and is part of an agreement for cultural exchanges the Moscow State Circus visits Germany. The opening of Munich Olympic Sports Stadium with a football match between Germany and Soviet Union teams; medicine in Germany is advanced and exports, after thorough testing, the greatest amounts of medicant to the world.
